text: i need build HubSpot app for message and calling between HubSpot and my own app
Hi. I am using the HubSpot python sdk which integrates with the v3 API endpoint, I think. Can someone from HubSpot look at this ticket? <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-python/issues/106>

Hi,
I was hoping someone would be able to help in coming up with the best solution for the following.
We are hoping to get events/updates on when a meeting is booked via the HubSpot portal by one of our sales staff. There are no properties on contact for 'last meeting booked' only for when used via the meeting tools.
ticket listing api not showing owner and contact data

We are using the HubSpot Search for users to search blogs to get results, I am trying to get better results based on multiple words instead of searching the first word then the second word. Like if a user searches “Apple tree”, I would like for HubSpot search to crawl all blog posts in the HTML title and Meta Description to find that exact phrase together, not look for “Apple” posts first then posts with “tree” in them based on the score. I looked at the Search API documentation: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content>, but not sure if there is an “Exact match” parameter” to add to help achieve this, any help would be great appreciated.

can you send me api for add ticket coment
add notes for particular comment
with text and attachment
